name: Pachinko Wars
overview: Pachinko Wars is a pachinko simulator that ties together its ball-bearing gambling gameplay with a plot about a pachinko-playing agent named 008. It was developed by Oersted, which also went on to port several early Mega Man games to the Sony PlayStation. Coconuts Japan published the game, who are known for the thematically similar Pachiokun series. The game was eventually followed by a sequel: Pachinko Wars II.
